item.title: 2 killed in terror attack outside synagogue in U.K.; attacker dead
item.description: The terror attack unfolded outside a synagogue in the English city of Manchester while worshippers were inside, authorities said.

item.title: Gateway Church founder Robert Morris pleads guilty in child sexual abuse case
item.description: The longtime Texas pastor admitted to indecent conduct with a child, resolving a decades-old case tied to allegations of abuse in Oklahoma.
